name: Warpath
desc: Bristleback works himself up into a fury every time he casts a spell, increasing his movement speed and damage.

name: Viscous Nasal Goo
desc: Covers a target in snot, causing it to have reduced armor and movement speed.  Multiple casts stack and refresh the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Laser
desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Nether Blast
desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

name: Borrowed Time
desc:
When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Burrowstrike
desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Spiked Carapace
desc: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

name: Chain Frost
desc: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to 10/10/10 times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Spell Shield
desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
